resources.string: Find out which Disney Princess are you!

Ariel is a bright, spirited, and headstrong mermaid princess with a strong passion for adventure and exploration. Despite this, Ariel\'s selflessness, compassion and intuitive way of thinking often resolve such problems, as she always takes full responsibility for her actions.

Aurora is a kind, elegant, graceful, angelic, and gentle person as well as a hopelessly romantic one. Despite her innocence and apparent dependence on others\' actions and opinions, Aurora isn\'t as passive or helpless as she may seem at first sight.

Belle has gained a significant amount of intelligence over the years due to her love of books, which have provided her with an elevated vocabulary, an active imagination, and an open mind. Despite all this, she doesn\'t have very many friends.

Cinderella declared herself independent and strong-willed by remaining kind-hearted and self-loving. She makes the most of her misfortunes by remaining optimistic of the possibilities of a brighter future.

Elsa appears calm, reserved, regal, graceful and poised. Beneath this cool and collected appearance, however, Elsa is quite turbulent. Elsa also has an altruistic disposition that contributes to her compassion towards her people.

Jasmine is introduced as feisty and no-nonsense, with zero tolerance for anyone that belittles her. Strong-willed and defiant, Jasmine is not afraid to speak her mind, nor will she hesitate to stand up for what she believes is right.

Merida is a very bold, brave, daring, courageous, stubborn, rebellious, and headstrong girl who does not fit the stereotypical princess role. She is very athletic, tends to be ungraceful, has bad manners, and is extremely tomboyish.
Mulan is a courageous, independent and an unselfish hero. She has a different level of determination and known to be a quick thinker that sometimes makes her impulsive.

Pocahontas is displayed as a noble, free-spirited, and highly spiritual young woman. She expresses wisdom beyond her years and offers kindness and guidance to those around her. She loves her homeland, adventure, and nature.

Rapunzel is a spirited and determined young woman. Additional misfortunes born through Rapunzel\'s upbringing would include such traits as anxiety and low self-esteem. Despite being fearful, she pushes herself forward to pursue her ambitions.

Snow White is well known for her kindness and optimism - both of which act as her greatest strengths, as they\'ve guided her safely through the various hardships faced throughout her life. She is quick to charm. She can also be playful, and somewhat sassy.
